item.description:
Argentina is a vast and diverse country. ¡Llegué Bien! is a game that invites you to go through it mixing traditional amusements: cards, tic-tac-toe, memory, puzzles, clothes and folkloric mischief. It is also a book of couplets written by Mariano Medina on Argentine roads and illustrated by Istvansch, whose pages are loose: they are the cards with which you advance during the game.

General objective: Entertain by enriching knowledge about Argentina, motivating reading and promoting interpersonal communication through play and expression.

HOW IS IT COMPOSED?
It is an easily transportable box (fits in one hand), which contains a sheet-board (map approved by the National Geographic Institute), an instruction sheet, 48 cards to play and 60 cards with proposals for activities and clothing based on the natural and cultural diversity of the country.
The instructions present a basic game rule and then propose instances of complexity and entertainment that include virtual interpersonal communication. Some proposals include oral expression displaying imagination based on real data.

In the game there can be both competitive and collaborative moments, depending freely on the composition of the group of players.

It is suggested for individuals 7 years of age and older, a minimum of 3 players and a maximum of 5.

WHO ARE YOUR RECIPIENTS?
Although it is intended for a family audience, it is also recommended within educational and recreational settings, due to its entertaining information and the skills it favors: Orality, reading, psychomotricity, image recognition, memory development, deductive reasoning, creativity, communication. interpersonal, associative intelligence.

Who wins the game
It is a tour of the country, the player who obtains the most kilometers in three hands or the first to complete a distance set by the group before starting wins. There are six ways to collect kilometers: Arrive safely, assist the traveler, Ru-ta-ti, Recount the trip, send couplets by cell phone, complete puzzles, propose rings. It is established beforehand which of these options is going to be played with.
